description:
Dress for life’s highpoints with Keb Fleece Hoodie in a functional wool blend. The flat-knitted, low-friction outside slides easily under a shell jacket while the inside’s lofty structure warms and wicks away moisture. A versatile and comfortable mid layer that is just as suitable in the summer mountains as for skiing in the winter.

Functional fleece that warms and wicks away moisture. Reinforcements in G-1000 Eco on the shoulders. Two zippered hand pockets. Vertical chest pocket with zipper. Well-fitting hood. Front zipper with chin guard. Smooth outside, brushed inside. Polyester (partly recycled), wool and elastane. Elastic edging around hood, cuffs and hem.
name: Fjallraven Keb Fleece Hoodie - Mens
